“Please know that I stand with those who stand against hate. I am committed to working to build a culture anchored in respect.”

To read the full statement, please see the link below. @OhioU_Diversity (4/4) https://t.co/W2RGyCzxgf

On March 20, Ohio University learned of racially derogatory actions in two separate residence halls on the Athens campus.

We take these matters very seriously and are thoroughly investigating them to determine appropriate next steps. (1/4)

Ohio University categorically rejects these types of hateful acts, which are anathema to our shared values of inclusion and trust.

We stand in solidarity with those who were directly affected, and incidents like this ultimately impact all of us. (3/4)

University leadership will be working together to develop action items as we continue efforts to eradicate these reprehensible behaviors at OHIO.

We are also providing supportive and safe spaces for processing for anyone who was directly impacted. (2/4)
